issue.title: [C++] Findre2Alt.cmake did not honor RE2_ROOT
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15782](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15782). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In Findre2Alt.cmake, cmake module find re2 package config first, which is likely to find system re2 package first over my customized re2 library. We should check RE2_ROOT variable first, and if there is no value existed, then we should search for system re2.
